document.full_text: the federal reserve should consider trimming its $600 billion bond purchase program given "pretty good" u.s. economic data, federal reserve bank of st. louis president james bullard said on saturday.
document.title: fed's bullard: may need to trim qe2: report
lines_and_colors: the federal reserve should consider trimming its $600 billion bond purchase program given "pretty good" u.s. economic data, federal reserve bank of st. louis president james bullard said on saturday.
